The living room is very bright with a beautiful view towards the north of the city, seeing the World Trade Center and the skyscrapers of Reforma Avenue. The kitchen is open and luxuriously equipped. The apartment has two bedrooms and two full bathrooms, the master bedroom has its own dressing room and bathroom. The balcony streches along the entire apartment and you can access it either from the bedrooms, or the living room. There are two large parking spaces that belomg to the appartment, without a car lift. Strict 24/7 surveillance. The outdoor amenities are located on the roof of the building, where you can enjoy 360-degree views of the entire city. This space has a hammock area, an organic garden, a pet area, children's games, a barbecue area, a Sky Lounge, a Jacuzzi, and a Sky Bar.
